100.name: Unknown Error
100.description: An error has occurred that has not been defined.

101.name: Must be logged in
101.description: You must be logged in to perform that request.
101.instructions: Please log in and try again.

102.name: Must not be logged in
102.description: You must not be logged in to perform that request.
102.instructions: Please log out and try again.

103.name: Not an admin
103.description: You must be an administrator to perform that request.
103.instructions: Please log in as an administrator and try again.

104.name: Not an institution
104.description: Either you are not logged in or are not interacting as an institution
104.instructions: Please log in or change your connection to an institution and try again.

105.name: Not an account
105.description: Either you are not logged in or are not interacting as an account
105.instructions: Please log in or change your connection to your account and try again.

106.name: Filled File Quota
106.description: You have exceeded your quota for uploading files.
106.instructions: Upload a smaller file or delete some of your existing files.

404.name: Not Found
404.description: You have sent a request that the server did not understand.
404.instructions: Please check the URL and try again.
